   21: %%
   22: -module(ei_tmo_SUITE).
   23: 
   24: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   25: -include_lib("kernel/include/inet.hrl").
   26: -include("ei_tmo_SUITE_data/ei_tmo_test_cases.hrl").
   27: 
   28: -export([all/0, groups/0, suite/0,
   29:          init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2,
   30:          framework_check/1, ei_accept_tmo/1, ei_connect_tmo/1,
   31:          ei_send_tmo/1,
   32:          ei_send_failure_tmo/1,
   33: 	 ei_connect_unreachable_tmo/0, ei_connect_unreachable_tmo/1,
   34:          ei_recv_tmo/1,
   35:          ei_dflags/1]).
   36: 
   37: suite() ->
   38:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   39:      {timetrap, {minutes, 1}}].
   40: 
   41: all() -> 
   42:     [framework_check,
   43:      ei_connect_unreachable_tmo,
   44:      ei_send_failure_tmo,
   45:      {group, default},
   46:      {group, ussi}].
   47: 
   48: groups() ->
   49:     Members = [ei_recv_tmo,
   50:                ei_accept_tmo,
   51:                ei_connect_tmo,
   52:                ei_send_tmo,
   53:                ei_dflags],
   54:     [{default, [], Members},
   55:      {ussi, [], Members}].
   56: 
   57: get_group(Config) ->
   58:     proplists:get_value(name, proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties,Config)).
   59: 
   60: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
   61:     runner:init_per_testcase(?MODULE, Case, Config).
   62: 
   63: end_per_testcase(_Case, _Config) ->
   64:     ok.
   65: 
   66: -define(DFLAG_PUBLISHED,                16#01).
   67: -define(DFLAG_ATOM_CACHE,               16#02).
   68: -define(DFLAG_EXTENDED_REFERENCES,      16#04).
   69: -define(DFLAG_DIST_MONITOR,             16#08).
   70: -define(DFLAG_FUN_TAGS,                 16#10).
   71: -define(DFLAG_NEW_FUN_TAGS,             16#80).
   72: -define(DFLAG_EXTENDED_PIDS_PORTS,     16#100).
   73: -define(DFLAG_EXPORT_PTR_TAG,          16#200).
   74: -define(DFLAG_BIT_BINARIES,            16#400).
   75: -define(DFLAG_NEW_FLOATS,              16#800).
   76: -define(DFLAG_UTF8_ATOMS,            16#10000).
   77: -define(DFLAG_MAP_TAG,               16#20000).
   78: -define(DFLAG_BIG_CREATION,          16#40000).
   79: -define(DFLAG_HANDSHAKE_23,        16#1000000).
   80: -define(DFLAG_UNLINK_ID,           16#2000000).
   81: -define(DFLAG_MANDATORY_25_DIGEST, 16#4000000).
   82: -define(DFLAG_V4_NC,             16#400000000).
   83: 
   84: %% From OTP R9 extended references are compulsory.
   85: %% From OTP R10 extended pids and ports are compulsory.
   86: %% From OTP 20 UTF8 atoms are compulsory.
   87: %% From OTP 21 NEW_FUN_TAGS is compulsory (no more tuple fallback {fun, ...}).
   88: %% From OTP 23 BIG_CREATION is compulsory.
   89: %% From OTP 25 NEW_FLOATS, MAP_TAG, EXPORT_PTR_TAG, and BIT_BINARIES are compulsory.
   90: 
   91: -define(DFLAGS_MANDATORY_25, 
   92:         (?DFLAG_EXTENDED_REFERENCES bor
   93:              ?DFLAG_FUN_TAGS bor
   94:              ?DFLAG_EXTENDED_PIDS_PORTS bor
   95:              ?DFLAG_UTF8_ATOMS bor
   96:              ?DFLAG_NEW_FUN_TAGS bor
   97:              ?DFLAG_BIG_CREATION bor
   98:              ?DFLAG_NEW_FLOATS bor
   99:              ?DFLAG_MAP_TAG bor
  100:              ?DFLAG_EXPORT_PTR_TAG bor
  101:              ?DFLAG_BIT_BINARIES bor
  102:              ?DFLAG_HANDSHAKE_23)).
  103: 
  104: %% From OTP 26 V4_NC, and UNLINK_ID are compulsory.
  105: 
  106: -define(DFLAGS_MANDATORY_26,
  107:         (?DFLAG_V4_NC bor
  108:              ?DFLAG_UNLINK_ID)).
  109: 
  110: -define(COMPULSORY_DFLAGS,
  111:         (?DFLAGS_MANDATORY_25 bor
  112:              ?DFLAGS_MANDATORY_26)).
  113: 
  114: %% Check the framework.
  115: framework_check(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  116:     %%dbg:tracer(),
  117:     %%dbg:p(self()),
  118:     P = runner:start(Config, ?framework_check),
  119:     runner:send_term(P,{hello,world}),
  120:     {term, {hello,world}} = runner:get_term(P),
  121:     runner:recv_eot(P),
  122:     ok.
  123: 
  124: 
  125: %% Check recv with timeouts.
  126: ei_recv_tmo(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  127:     do_one_recv(Config,c_node_recv_tmo_1),
  128:     do_one_recv_failure(Config,c_node_recv_tmo_2),
  129:     ok.
  130: 
  131: 
  132: do_one_recv(Config,CNode) ->
  133:     {_,Host} = split(node()),
  134:     P1 = runner:start(Config, ?recv_tmo),
  135:     runner:send_term(P1,{CNode,
  136:                          erlang:get_cookie(),
  137:                          node(),
  138:                          get_group(Config)}),
  139:     {term, X} = runner:get_term(P1, 10000),
  140:     true = is_integer(X),
  141:     CNode1 = join(CNode,Host),
  142:     Term1 = {hej,[hopp,{i,[lingon,"skogen"]}]},
  143:     {test,CNode1} ! Term1,
  144:     {term, Term1} = runner:get_term(P1, 10000),
  145:     runner:recv_eot(P1).
  146: 
  147: do_one_recv_failure(Config,CNode) ->
  148:     P1 = runner:start(Config, ?recv_tmo),
  149:     runner:send_term(P1,{CNode,
  150:                          erlang:get_cookie(),
  151:                          node(),
  152:                          get_group(Config)}),
  153:     {term, X} = runner:get_term(P1, 10000),
  154:     true = is_integer(X),
  155:     {term, {Ret,ETimedout,ETimedout}} = runner:get_term(P1, 10000),
  156:     true = (Ret < 0),
  157:     runner:recv_eot(P1).
  158: 
  159: -define(EI_DIST_LOW, 6).
  160: -define(EI_DIST_HIGH, 6).
  161: 
  162: %% An OTP-23 or 24 node may connect assuming 5 or higher.
  163: -define(EI_DIST_LOWEST_ASSUMED, 5).
  164: 
  165: 
  166: %% Check send with timeouts.
  167: ei_send_tmo(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  168:     register(ei_send_tmo_1,self()),
  169:     do_one_send(Config,self(),c_node_send_tmo_1),
  170:     do_one_send(Config,ei_send_tmo_1,c_node_send_tmo_2),
  171:     ok.
  172: 
  173: 
  174: do_one_send(Config,From,CNode) ->
  175:     {_,Host} = split(node()),
  176:     P1 = runner:start(Config, ?send_tmo),
  177:     runner:send_term(P1,{CNode,
  178:                          erlang:get_cookie(),
  179:                          node(),
  180:                          get_group(Config)}),
  181:     {term, X} = runner:get_term(P1, 10000),
  182:     true = is_integer(X),
  183:     CNode1 = join(CNode,Host),
  184:     Term1 = {hej,[hopp,{i,[lingon,"skogen"]}]},
  185:     {test,CNode1} ! {From,1,Term1},
  186:     ok = receive
  187:              Term1 ->
  188:                  ok
  189:          after 2000 ->
  190:                    error
  191:          end,
  192:     {term, 0} = runner:get_term(P1, 10000),
  193:     runner:recv_eot(P1).
  194: 
  195: ei_send_failure_tmo(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  196:     register(ei_send_tmo_1,self()),
  197:     do_one_send_failure(Config,self(),cccc1,c_nod_send_tmo_3),
  198:     do_one_send_failure(Config,ei_send_tmo_1,cccc2,c_nod_send_tmo_4),
  199:     ok.
  200: 
  201: do_one_send_failure(Config,From,FakeName,CName) ->
  202:     {_,Host} = split(node()),
  203:     OurName = join(FakeName,Host),
  204:     Node = join(CName,Host),
  205:     LSocket = case gen_tcp:listen(0, [{active, false}, {packet,2}]) of
  206:                   {ok, Socket} ->
  207:                       Socket;
  208:                   Else ->
  209:                       exit(Else)
  210:               end,
  211:     EpmdSocket = epmd_register(OurName, LSocket),
  212:     P3 = runner:start(Config, ?send_tmo),
  213:     Cookie = kaksmula_som_ingen_bryr_sig_om,
  214:     runner:send_term(P3,{CName,
  215:                          Cookie,
  216:                          OurName,
  217:                          default}),
  218:     SocketB = case gen_tcp:accept(LSocket) of
  219:                   {ok, Socket1} ->
  220:                       Socket1;
  221:                   Else2 ->
  222:                       exit(Else2)
  223:               end,
  224:     {hidden,Node} = recv_name(SocketB),  % See 1)
  225:     send_status(SocketB, ok),
  226:     MyChallengeB = gen_challenge(),
  227:     send_challenge(SocketB, OurName, MyChallengeB),
  228:     HisChallengeB = recv_challenge_reply(SocketB,
  229:                                          MyChallengeB,
  230:                                          Cookie),
  231:     DigestB = gen_digest(HisChallengeB,Cookie),
  232:     send_challenge_ack(SocketB, DigestB),
  233:     inet:setopts(SocketB, [{active, false},
  234:                            {packet, 4}]),
  235:     {term, X} = runner:get_term(P3, 10000),
  236:     true = is_integer(X),
  237:     Message = [112,term_to_binary({6,self(),'',test}),
  238:                term_to_binary({From,50000,
  239:                                {app,["lapp",{sa,["att",du,{slapp,
  240:                                                            sitta}]}]}})],
  241:     gen_tcp:send(SocketB,Message),
  242: 
  243:     %% At this point the test program starts sending messages (max 50000). Since
  244:     %% we're not receiving, eventually the send buffer fills up. Then no more 
  245:     %% sending is possible and select() times out. The number of messages sent
  246:     %% before this happens is returned in Iters. The timeout value for get_term/2
  247:     %% must be large enough so there's time for the select() to time out and
  248:     %% the test program to return the error tuple (below).
  249: 
  250:     {term,{Res,ETO,Iters,ETO}} = runner:get_term(P3, 20000),
  251:     runner:recv_eot(P3),
  252:     true = ((Res < 0) and (Iters > 0)),
  253:     gen_tcp:close(SocketB),
  254:     gen_tcp:close(EpmdSocket),
  255:     ok.
  256: 
  257: 
  258: %% Check accept with timeouts.
  259: ei_connect_unreachable_tmo() -> [{require, test_host_not_reachable}].
  260: 
  261: ei_connect_unreachable_tmo(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  262:     DummyNode = make_and_check_dummy(),
  263:     P = runner:start(Config, ?connect_tmo),
  264:     runner:send_term(P,{c_nod_connect_tmo_1,
  265:                         kaksmula_som_ingen_bryr_sig_om,
  266:                         DummyNode,
  267:                         default}),
  268:     {term,{-3,ETimedout,ETimedout}} = runner:get_term(P, 10000),
  269:     runner:recv_eot(P),
  270:     ok.
  271: 
  272: ei_connect_tmo(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  273:     Flags = ?COMPULSORY_DFLAGS bor ?DFLAG_MANDATORY_25_DIGEST,
  274: 
  275:     P2 = runner:start(Config, ?connect_tmo),
  276:     runner:send_term(P2,{c_nod_connect_tmo_2,
  277:                          erlang:get_cookie(),
  278:                          node(),
  279:                          get_group(Config)}),
  280:     {term, X} = runner:get_term(P2, 10000),
  281:     runner:recv_eot(P2),
  282:     true = is_integer(X),
  283: 
  284:     %% Aborted handshake test...
  285:     {_,Host} = split(node()),
  286:     OurName = join(cccc,Host),
  287:     Node = join(c_nod_connect_tmo_3,Host),
  288:     LSocket = case gen_tcp:listen(0, [{active, false}, {packet,2}]) of
  289:                   {ok, Socket} ->
  290:                       Socket;
  291:                   Else ->
  292:                       exit(Else)
  293:               end,
  294:     EpmdSocket = epmd_register(OurName, LSocket),
  295:     P3 = runner:start(Config, ?connect_tmo),
  296:     Cookie = kaksmula_som_ingen_bryr_sig_om,
  297:     runner:send_term(P3,{c_nod_connect_tmo_3,
  298:                          Cookie,
  299:                          OurName,
  300:                          get_group(Config)}),
  301:     SocketB = case gen_tcp:accept(LSocket) of
  302:                   {ok, Socket1} ->
  303:                       Socket1;
  304:                   Else2 ->
  305:                       exit(Else2)
  306:               end,
  307:     {hidden,Node} = recv_name(SocketB),  % See 1)
  308:     send_status(SocketB, ok),
  309:     MyChallengeB = gen_challenge(),
  310:     send_challenge(SocketB, OurName, MyChallengeB, Flags),
  311:     _HisChallengeB = recv_challenge_reply(SocketB,
  312:                                           MyChallengeB,
  313:                                           Cookie),
  314:     {term,{-1,ETimedout,ETimedout}} = runner:get_term(P3, 10000),
  315:     runner:recv_eot(P3),
  316:     gen_tcp:close(SocketB),
  317:     gen_tcp:close(EpmdSocket),
  318:     ok.
  319: 
  320: 
  321: %% Check accept with timeouts.
  322: ei_accept_tmo(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  323:     [begin
  324:          io:format("Test assumed ver=~p\n",
  325:                    [AssumedVer]),
  326:          do_ei_accept_tmo(Config, AssumedVer)
  327:      end
  328:      || AssumedVer <- lists:seq(?EI_DIST_LOWEST_ASSUMED, ?EI_DIST_HIGH)],
  329:     ok.
  330: 
  331: do_ei_accept_tmo(Config, AssumedVer) ->
  332:     Flags = ?COMPULSORY_DFLAGS bor ?DFLAG_MANDATORY_25_DIGEST,
  333: 
  334:     P = runner:start(Config, ?accept_tmo),
  335:     runner:send_term(P,{c_nod_som_ingen_kontaktar_1,
  336:                         kaksmula_som_ingen_bryr_sig_om,
  337:                         get_group(Config)}),
  338:     {term,{-1,ETimedout,ETimedout}} = runner:get_term(P, 10000),
  339:     runner:recv_eot(P),
  340: 
  341:     P2 = runner:start(Config, ?accept_tmo),
  342:     runner:send_term(P2,{c_nod_som_vi_kontaktar_1,
  343:                          erlang:get_cookie(),
  344:                          get_group(Config)}),
  345:     receive after 1000 -> ok end,
  346:     CNode1 = make_node(c_nod_som_vi_kontaktar_1),
  347:     {ignored,CNode1} ! tjenare,
  348:     {term, X} = runner:get_term(P2, 10000),
  349:     runner:recv_eot(P2),
  350:     true = is_integer(X),
  351: 
  352:     normal_accept(Config, AssumedVer, Flags),
  353: 
  354:     ok.
  355: 
  356: normal_accept(Config, AssumedVer, Flags) ->
  357:     P = runner:start(Config, ?accept_tmo),
  358:     runner:send_term(P,{c_nod_som_vi_kontaktar_2,
  359:                          erlang:get_cookie(),
  360:                          get_group(Config)}),
  361:     receive after 1000 -> ok end,
  362:     CNode2 = make_node(c_nod_som_vi_kontaktar_2),
  363:     {NA,NB} = split(CNode2),
  364:     {_,Host} = split(node()),
  365:     OurName = join(ccc,Host),
  366:     {port,PortNo,?EI_DIST_HIGH} = erl_epmd:port_please(NA,NB),
  367:     {ok, SocketA} = gen_tcp:connect(atom_to_list(NB),PortNo,
  368:                                     [{active,false},
  369:                                      {packet,2}]),
  370:     send_name(SocketA, OurName, AssumedVer, Flags),
  371:     ok = recv_status(SocketA),
  372:     {hidden,_Node,HisChallengeA} = recv_challenge(SocketA), % See 1)
  373:     _OurChallengeA = gen_challenge(),
  374:     _OurDigestA = gen_digest(HisChallengeA, erlang:get_cookie()),
  375:     %% Dont do the last two steps of the connection setup...
  376:     %% send_challenge_reply(SocketA, OurChallengeA, OurDigestA),
  377:     %% ok = recv_challenge_ack(SocketA, OurChallengeA, erlang:get_cookie()),
  378:     {term, {-1,ETimedout,ETimedout}} = runner:get_term(P, 10000),
  379:     runner:recv_eot(P),
  380:     gen_tcp:close(SocketA).
  381: 
  382: normal_connect(Config, Flags) ->
  383:     {_,Host} = split(node()),
  384:     OurName = join(cccc,Host),
  385:     Node = join(c_nod_connect_tmo_3,Host),
  386:     LSocket = case gen_tcp:listen(0, [{active, false}, {packet,2}]) of
  387:                   {ok, Socket} ->
  388:                       Socket;
  389:                   Else ->
  390:                       exit(Else)
  391:               end,
  392:     EpmdSocket = epmd_register(OurName, LSocket),
  393:     P3 = runner:start(Config, ?connect_tmo),
  394:     Cookie = kaksmula_som_ingen_bryr_sig_om,
  395:     runner:send_term(P3, {c_nod_connect_tmo_3,
  396:                           Cookie,
  397:                           OurName,
  398:                           get_group(Config)}),
  399:     SocketB = case gen_tcp:accept(LSocket) of
  400:                   {ok, Socket1} ->
  401:                       Socket1;
  402:                   Else2 ->
  403:                       exit(Else2)
  404:               end,
  405:     {hidden,Node} = recv_name(SocketB),
  406:     send_status(SocketB, ok),
  407:     MyChallengeB = gen_challenge(),
  408:     send_challenge(SocketB, OurName, MyChallengeB, Flags),
  409:     gen_tcp:close(SocketB),
  410:     gen_tcp:close(EpmdSocket),
  411:     ok.
  412: 
  413: make_node(X) ->
  414:     list_to_atom(atom_to_list(X) ++ "@" ++ 
  415:                  hd(tl(string:tokens(atom_to_list(node()),"@")))).
  416: 
  417: 
  418: make_and_check_dummy() ->
  419:     % First check that the host has an ip and is *not* reachable
  420:     HostNotReachable = ct:get_config(test_host_not_reachable),
  421:     case gen_tcp:connect(HostNotReachable, 23, [{active,false}],5000) of
  422:         {error,timeout} -> ok;
  423:         {error,ehostunreach} -> ok
  424:     end,
  425: 
  426:     list_to_atom("dummy@"++HostNotReachable).
  427: 
  428: %% Test that erl_interface sets the appropriate distributions flags.
  429: ei_dflags(Config) ->
  430:     AssumedVer = 5,
  431:     OurVer = 6,
  432: 
  433:     %% Test compatibility with OTP 24 and earlier.
  434:     normal_connect(Config, ?COMPULSORY_DFLAGS),
  435:     normal_accept(Config, AssumedVer, ?COMPULSORY_DFLAGS),
  436:     normal_accept(Config, OurVer, ?COMPULSORY_DFLAGS),
  437: 
  438:     %% Test compatibility with future versions.
  439:     normal_connect(Config, ?DFLAG_MANDATORY_25_DIGEST bor ?DFLAGS_MANDATORY_26),
  440:     normal_accept(Config, AssumedVer, ?DFLAG_MANDATORY_25_DIGEST bor ?DFLAGS_MANDATORY_26),
  441:     normal_accept(Config, OurVer, ?DFLAG_MANDATORY_25_DIGEST bor ?DFLAGS_MANDATORY_26),
  442: 
  443:     ok.
  444: 
  445: %%
  446: %% Stolen from the erl_distribution_wb_test in kernel
  447: %% To be able to do partial handshakes...
  448: %%
  449: 
  450: -define(to_port(Socket, Data),
  451:         case inet_tcp:send(Socket, Data) of
  452:             {error, closed} ->
  453:                 self() ! {tcp_closed, Socket},
  454:                 {error, closed};
  455:             R ->
  456:                 R
  457:         end).
  458: 
  459: -define(shutdown(X), exit(X)).
  460: -define(int16(X), [((X) bsr 8) band 16#ff, (X) band 16#ff]).
  461: 
  462: -define(int32(X), 
  463:         [((X) bsr 24) band 16#ff, ((X) bsr 16) band 16#ff,
  464:          ((X) bsr 8) band 16#ff, (X) band 16#ff]).
  465: 
  466: -define(i16(X1,X0),
  467:         (?u16(X1,X0) - 
  468:          (if (X1) > 127 -> 16#10000; true -> 0 end))).
  469: 
  470: -define(u16(X1,X0),
  471:         (((X1) bsl 8) bor (X0))).
  472: 
  473: -define(u32(X3,X2,X1,X0),
  474:         (((X3) bsl 24) bor ((X2) bsl 16) bor ((X1) bsl 8) bor (X0))).
  475: 
  476: %%
  477: %% Handshake utilities
  478: %%
  479: 
  480: %%
  481: %% MD5 hashing
  482: %%
  483: 
  484: %% This is no proper random number, but that is not really important in 
  485: %% this test
  486: gen_challenge() ->
  487:     {_,_,N} = os:timestamp(),
  488:     N.
  489: 
  490: %% Generate a message digest from Challenge number and Cookie	
  491: gen_digest(Challenge, Cookie) when is_integer(Challenge), is_atom(Cookie) ->
  492:     C0 = erlang:md5_init(),
  493:     C1 = erlang:md5_update(C0, atom_to_list(Cookie)),
  494:     C2 = erlang:md5_update(C1, integer_to_list(Challenge)),
  495:     binary_to_list(erlang:md5_final(C2)).
  496: 
  497: 
  498: %%
  499: %% The different stages of the MD5 handshake
  500: %%
  501: 
  502: send_status(Socket, Stat) ->
  503:     case gen_tcp:send(Socket, [$s | atom_to_list(Stat)]) of
  504:         {error, _} -> ?shutdown(could_not_send_status);
  505:         _ -> true
  506:     end.
  507: 
  508: 
  509: recv_status(Socket) ->
  510:     case gen_tcp:recv(Socket, 0) of
  511:         {ok, [$s|StrStat]} ->
  512:             list_to_atom(StrStat);
  513:         Bad ->
  514:             exit(Bad)
  515:     end.
  516: 
  517: send_challenge(Socket, Node, Challenge) ->
  518:     DefaultFlags = ?COMPULSORY_DFLAGS bor ?DFLAG_MANDATORY_25_DIGEST,
  519:     send_challenge(Socket, Node, Challenge, DefaultFlags).
  520: 
  521: send_challenge(Socket, Node, Challenge, Flags) ->
  522:     NodeName = atom_to_binary(Node, latin1),
  523:     NameLen = byte_size(NodeName),
  524:     Creation = erts_internal:get_creation(),
  525:     ?to_port(Socket, [$N,
  526:                       << Flags:64,
  527:                          Challenge:32,
  528:                          Creation:32,
  529:                          NameLen:16>>,
  530:                       NodeName]).
  531: 
  532: recv_challenge(Socket) ->
  533:     case gen_tcp:recv(Socket, 0) of
  534:         {ok,[$N, F7,F6,F5,F4,F3,F2,F1,F0, CA3,CA2,CA1,CA0,
  535:              _Cr3,_Cr2,_Cr1,_Cr0, NL1,NL0 | Rest]} ->
  536:             <<Flags:64>> = <<F7,F6,F5,F4,F3,F2,F1,F0>>,
  537:             verify_flags(Flags),
  538:             Type = flags_to_type(Flags),
  539:             NameLen = ?u16(NL1,NL0),
  540:             {NodeName,_} = lists:split(NameLen, Rest),
  541:             Node = list_to_atom(NodeName),
  542:             Challenge = ?u32(CA3,CA2,CA1,CA0),
  543:             %%Creation = ?u32(Cr3,Cr2,Cr1,Cr0),
  544:             %%true = (Creation =/= 0),
  545:             {Type,Node,Challenge};
  546: 
  547:         _ ->
  548:             ?shutdown(no_node)
  549:     end.
  550: 
  551: flags_to_type(Flags) ->
  552:     case Flags band ?DFLAG_PUBLISHED of
  553:         0 ->
  554:             hidden;
  555:         _ ->
  556:             normal
  557:     end.
  558: 
  559: %send_challenge_reply(Socket, Challenge, Digest) ->
  560: %    ?to_port(Socket, [$r,?int32(Challenge),Digest]).
  561: 
  562: recv_challenge_reply(Socket, ChallengeA, Cookie) ->
  563:     case gen_tcp:recv(Socket, 0) of
  564:         {ok,[$r,CB3,CB2,CB1,CB0 | SumB]} when length(SumB) == 16 ->
  565:             SumA = gen_digest(ChallengeA, Cookie),
  566:             ChallengeB = ?u32(CB3,CB2,CB1,CB0),
  567:             if SumB == SumA ->
  568:                    ChallengeB;
  569:                true ->
  570:                    ?shutdown(bad_challenge_reply)
  571:             end;
  572:         Other ->
  573:             ?shutdown({recv_challenge_reply,Other})
  574:     end.
  575: 
  576: send_challenge_ack(Socket, Digest) ->
  577:     ?to_port(Socket, [$a,Digest]).
  578: 
  579: %recv_challenge_ack(Socket, ChallengeB, CookieA) ->
  580: %    case gen_tcp:recv(Socket, 0) of
  581: %        {ok,[$a | SumB]} when length(SumB) == 16 ->
  582: %            SumA = gen_digest(ChallengeB, CookieA),
  583: %            if SumB == SumA ->
  584: %                   ok;
  585: %               true ->
  586: %                   ?shutdown(bad_challenge_ack)
  587: %            end;
  588: %        _ ->
  589: %            ?shutdown(bad_challenge_ack)
  590: %    end.
  591: 
  592: send_name(Socket, MyNode, AssumedVer, Flags0) ->
  593:     Flags = Flags0 bor?DFLAG_HANDSHAKE_23,
  594:     NodeName = atom_to_binary(MyNode, latin1),
  595:     if AssumedVer =:= 5 ->
  596:             ?to_port(Socket, [$n,?int16(?EI_DIST_HIGH),?int32(Flags),NodeName]);
  597:        AssumedVer >= 6 ->
  598:             Creation = erts_internal:get_creation(),
  599:             ?to_port(Socket, [$N,
  600:                               <<Flags:64,
  601:                                 Creation:32,
  602:                                 (byte_size(NodeName)):16>>,
  603:                               NodeName])
  604:     end.
  605: 
  606: recv_name(Socket) ->
  607:     case gen_tcp:recv(Socket, 0) of
  608:         {ok,[$N, F7,F6,F5,F4,F3,F2,F1,F0, _Cr3,_Cr2,_Cr1,_Cr0, NL1, NL0 | Rest]} ->
  609:             {OtherNode, _Residue} = lists:split(?u16(NL1,NL0), Rest),
  610:             <<Flags:64>> = <<F7,F6,F5,F4,F3,F2,F1,F0>>,
  611:             verify_flags(Flags),
  612:             Type = flags_to_type(Flags),
  613:             {Type, list_to_atom(OtherNode)};
  614:         Res ->
  615:             ?shutdown({no_node,Res})
  616:     end.
  617: 
  618: %%
  619: %% tell_name is for old handshake
  620: %%
  621: %tell_name(Socket, MyNode0, Version) ->
  622: %    MyNode = atom_to_list(MyNode0),
  623: %    {ok, {{Ip1,Ip2,Ip3,Ip4}, _}} = inet:sockname(Socket),
  624: %    ?to_port(Socket, [$h,?int16(Version),Ip1,Ip2,Ip3,Ip4] ++ MyNode).
  625: 
  626: %%
  627: %% The communication with EPMD follows
  628: %%
  629: do_register_node(NodeName, TcpPort) ->
  630:     case gen_tcp:connect({127,0,0,1}, get_epmd_port(), []) of
  631:         {ok, Socket} ->
  632:             {N0,_} = split(NodeName),
  633:             Name = atom_to_list(N0),
  634:             Extra = "",
  635:             Elen = length(Extra),
  636:             Len = 1+2+1+1+2+2+2+length(Name)+2+Elen,
  637:             gen_tcp:send(Socket, [?int16(Len), $x,
  638:                                   ?int16(TcpPort),
  639:                                   $M,
  640:                                   0,
  641:                                   ?int16(?EI_DIST_HIGH),
  642:                                   ?int16(?EI_DIST_LOW),
  643:                                   ?int16(length(Name)),
  644:                                   Name,
  645:                                   ?int16(Elen),
  646:                                   Extra]),
  647:             case wait_for_reg_reply(Socket, []) of
  648:                 {error, epmd_close} ->
  649:                     exit(epmd_broken);
  650:                 Other ->
  651:                     Other
  652:             end;
  653:         Error ->
  654:             Error
  655:     end.
  656: 
  657: wait_for_reg_reply(Socket, SoFar) ->
  658:     receive
  659:         {tcp, Socket, Data0} ->
  660:             case SoFar ++ Data0 of
  661:                 [$y, 0, Cr1,Cr0] ->
  662:                     {alive, Socket, ?u16(Cr1,Cr0)};
  663:                 [$v, 0, Cr3,Cr2,Cr1,Cr0] ->
  664:                     {alive, Socket, ?u32(Cr3,Cr2,Cr1,Cr0)};
  665:                 Data when length(Data) < 4 ->
  666:                     wait_for_reg_reply(Socket, Data);
  667:                 Garbage ->
  668:                     {error, {garbage_from_epmd, Garbage}}
  669:             end;
  670:         {tcp_closed, Socket} ->
  671:             {error, epmd_close}
  672:     after 10000 ->
  673:               gen_tcp:close(Socket),
  674:               {error, no_reg_reply_from_epmd}
  675:     end.
  676: 
  677: 
  678: epmd_register(NodeName, ListenSocket) ->
  679:     {ok,{_,TcpPort}} = inet:sockname(ListenSocket),
  680:     case do_register_node(NodeName, TcpPort) of
  681:         {alive, Socket, _Creation} ->
  682:             Socket;
  683:         Other ->
  684:             exit(Other)
  685:     end.
  686: 
  687: verify_flags(Flags) ->
  688:     RequiredFlags = ?COMPULSORY_DFLAGS bor ?DFLAG_MANDATORY_25_DIGEST,
  689:     if
  690:         Flags band RequiredFlags =:= RequiredFlags ->
  691:             ok;
  692:         true ->
  693:             io:format("Given flags:    ~.16.0B\n", [Flags]),
  694:             io:format("Required flags: ~.16.0B\n", [RequiredFlags]),
  695:             ct:fail(missing_dflags)
  696:     end.
  697: 
  698: %%
  699: %% Utilities
  700: %%
  701: 
  702: %% Split a nodename
  703: split([$@|T],A) ->
  704:     {lists:reverse(A),T};
  705: split([H|T],A) ->
  706:     split(T,[H|A]).
  707: 
  708: split(Atom) ->
  709:     {A,B} = split(atom_to_list(Atom),[]),
  710:     {list_to_atom(A),list_to_atom(B)}.
  711: 
  712: %% Build a nodename
  713: join(Name,Host) ->
  714:     list_to_atom(atom_to_list(Name) ++ "@" ++ atom_to_list(Host)).
  715: 
  716: get_epmd_port() ->
  717:     case init:get_argument(epmd_port) of
  718:         {ok, [[PortStr|_]|_]} when is_list(PortStr) ->
  719:             list_to_integer(PortStr);
  720:         error ->
  721:             4369 % Default epmd port
  722:     end.
